title: "Summary stats"
output:
  html_document: default
  pdf_document: default
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
```

```{r}
covid_df <- read_csv("bq-results-20200919-221703-44o64hvfk23a.csv")
```

```{r}
covid_df <- covid_df %>%
  select(-c(statesympton, datesympton, state_name, state_fips_code))
```

```{r}
covid_df2 <- covid_df %>% 
  group_by(state) %>%
  select(-date) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  summarize_all(mean)
```

```{r}
summary(covid_df)
```


```{r}
datatable(covid_df2)
```
